name: Don't Look Back (itch) (Ian Matic)
description:
Don't Look Back is a 2D horror experience where the goal is to find a way out of each level. This isn't so simple, as the path is often non-linear, and some doors are locked and require keys. Oh, there is also monster wandering around trying to kill you :)

Controls are covered in tutorial level, requires mouse+keyboard.

Developed by Ian Matic in conjunction with James Schrupp, TJ Driscoll, Anthony Ferraioli, & Maliik Bryan
